item.title: The 10 worst things Trump did in 2025
item.description: The president had a remarkable first year back in office, but he made some serious missteps, too.

item.title: Was 2025 the ‘end of America’? Of course not.
item.description:
Stories about violence, the declining economy and our fractured culture dominated this year. But if you look beyond the headlines and examine the full data, 2025 wasn’t as bad as it seemed.
Join host Megan McArdle as she puts the year into perspective.

item.title: The State Department font change is about respect, not aesthetics
item.description: I’m a blind diplomat. Sans serif type can help millions of people with poor vision and disabilities.
